title: Looking for a fun Community/Team to join in!
body:
I'm looking for a community who would accept a 15yo girl in their team. I'm not **ALWAYS** serious in games since I just want to have fun. I was in Silver 5 last season and I was determined to get better, not in terms of Division, but I want to get more experience so that I can use that as a learning source :)

Anyway, I want to meet new and fun members that I can play games with :D

replies.body:
Most of my friends/team members are 20+ but some of us are girls (including myself) c:
We usually play ARAMs to chill :)
If you're interested in joining an active gaming community, check out TAW at http://taw.net/. We are part of the League of Legends Division, Battalion 5. If you have any question feel free to add me.
I already have :) but where are the people who are active and wants to play?
